system.description: When a faction seizes a vulnerable asset by force, roll with their Strength.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, the strike instead results in the utter destruction of the thing the attacking faction attempted to seize; the MC picks just one off the list, and someone comes to one of the PCs looking for help obtaining justice or revenge.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, they take hold of it, seizing or transforming it for their own purposes. On a 7-9, they choose one:

  • they don't sacrifice a leader or ally
  • they don't cause serious collateral damage
  • they don't suffer an immediate, retaliatory attack

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a hit, they take hold of it, seizing or transforming it for their own purposes. On a 10+, all three:

  • they don't sacrifice a leader or ally
  • they don't cause serious collateral damage
  • they don't suffer an immediate, retaliatory attack
